official_title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating November 30, 1978, as "National Postal Worker's Recognition Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate November 30, 1978, as "National Postal Workers' Recognition Day."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating November 30, 1978, as "National Postal Worker's Recognition Day".
